ritual.ariaLabel: Yingira omukolo - Weereza erinnya mu Orbital Temple

footer.credits: Orbital Temple mulimu gwa Edson Pavoni, ogwatondebwa nga bakolagana ne Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, n’abo bonna abagenda mu maaso n’okuweereza amannya mu yeekaalu eno.
